backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister entrypoint containing an empty actor definition.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files, hooks, components, and configs.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom theme variables defining light/dark mode color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML root document mounting the React app and loading the Vite entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the TimerScreen component with a ThemeProvider to enable dark mode and system theming.
frontend/src/components/EventSelector.ts: Dropdown component for selecting WCA events, disabled during active solves.
frontend/src/components/ScramblePanel.ts: Card UI showing the current scramble with a button to generate a new one.
frontend/src/components/ScrambleVisualiz: Loads and displays a 2D puzzle visualization using TwistyPlayer from a CDN based on the selected event.
frontend/src/components/SessionStats.tsx: Displays computed session statistics such as current, best, ao5, ao12, and mo3 in a card layout.
frontend/src/components/SolveHistory.tsx: Scrollable grid showing past solves with numbering and DNF/penalty indicators.
frontend/src/components/TimerDisplay.tsx: Main timer UI rendering inspection countdown, solve time, state labels, and handling pointer interactions.
frontend/src/components/TimerScreen.tsx: Main timer screen managing event selection, scrambles, solves, stats, and session persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and updates a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, loading, and context management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaScramble.ts: Generates WCA scrambles via cubing.js and tracks scramble state and loading status.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaTimerControls.t: Implements full WCA-style timer logic including inspection timing, warnings, running, and stopping.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining color themes and utility classes for the timer UI.
frontend/src/lib/inspectionAudio.ts: Web Audio helper that plays 8s and 5s inspection warnings via generated beeps.
frontend/src/lib/sessionCookie.ts: Saves and loads session data to a cookie, including event, scramble, and solves.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStats.ts: Computes session statistics like current time, best, ao5, ao12, and mo3 from solve history.
frontend/src/lib/wcaEvents.ts: Defines the WCAEvent interface and exports a list of official WCA events with IDs, names, and scramble event codes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/cubing.d.ts: Provides TypeScript declarations for cubing.net scramble and twisty player modules.
frontend/src/types/solves.ts: Defines solve and inspection types plus helpers to format display and numeric times with penalties.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, plugins, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues, and existing feature requirements for timer inspection and warning fixes.
